500.MESSAGE: El servidor hizo un oopsy woopsy

account_balance.ADD_MESSAGE_P1: Puedes añadir fondos a tu cuenta Intellivoid pero esos fondos no pueden ser retirados o trasnferidos a otra cuenta Intellivoid, como es explicado en nuestros terminos de servicio.
account_balance.ADD_MESSAGE_P2: Este proceso es procesado manualmente por Intellivoid y puede tomar hasta 48 horas para ser procesado.
account_balance.ADD_MESSAGE_P3: Tu correo de PayPal debe ser el mismo que el de tu cuenta Intellivoid, si no son iguales, la transacción fallará

application_authenticate.APPLICATION_TICK_OFFICIAL: This is an official Intellivoid Application/Service
application_authenticate.APPLICATION_DANGER_ALERT: This application/service is considered untrusted and unsafe. Please be cautious about the information and permissions you choose to share.
application_authenticate.PERMISSIONS_REQUEST_HEADER: %s would like to have access to
application_authenticate.PERMISSIONS_USERNAME_AVATAR_TOOLTIP: Can view your Username and Avatar which is public by default
application_authenticate.PERMISSIONS_PERSONAL_INFORMATION_TOOLTIP: Can view information like your First Name, Last name, and Birthday if you made them available
application_authenticate.PERMISSIONS_EDIT_PERSONAL_INFORMATION_TO: Can edit your information like your First Name, Last name and Birthday. This does not mean the information can be viewed if allowed
application_authenticate.PERMISSIONS_TELEGRAM_NOTIFICATIONS_TOOLT: Can send you notifications via Telegram if you linked a Telegram Account to your Account
application_authenticate.PERMISSIONS_MAKE_PURCHASES_TOOLTIP: Allows you to make purchases or activate subscriptions using your Account Balance (Intellivoid Only)
application_authenticate.AUTHENTICATION_NOTICE_OFFICIAL: By clicking Authenticate you are authenticating to %s with the permissions you choose to grant to this application or service. This is an official Intellivoid Application/Service, whatever information or permissions you grant will be used via Intellivoid's terms of service and privacy policies which can be reviewed on the respective website or application. You can revoke access at any time via Intellivoid Accounts
application_authenticate.AUTHENTICATION_NOTICE_VERIFIED: By clicking Authenticate you are authenticating to %s with the permissions you choose to grant to this application or service. This Application has been verified to be official by Intellivoid, however this is not an official Intellivoid Application/Service, whatever information or permissions you grant will be used in their terms of service and privacy policies if they have one. You can revoke access at any time via Intellivoid Accounts
application_authenticate.AUTHENTICATION_NOTICE_GENERIC: By clicking Authenticate you are authenticating to %s with the permissions you choose to grant to this application or service. This is not an official Intellivoid Application/Service, whatever information or permissions you grant will be used in their terms of service and privacy policies if they have one. You can revoke access at any time via Intellivoid Accounts

application_error.PAGE_SUB_HEADER: There was an error while trying to process your authentication request

confirm_subscription_purchase.APPLICATION_TICK_OFFICIAL: This is an official Intellivoid Application/Service
confirm_subscription_purchase.INITIAL_PAYMENT_TOOLTIP: The amount you have to pay to start this subscription
confirm_subscription_purchase.INITIAL_PAYMENT_PROMOTION_ACTIVE: You will initially pay $%pp USD to start this subscription instead of $%op USD
confirm_subscription_purchase.INITIAL_PAYMENT_CYCLE_TEXT: You will initially pay $%pp USD to start this subscription
confirm_subscription_purchase.BILLING_CYCLE_TOOLTIP: The billing cycle is when your subscription's billing gets processed automatically
confirm_subscription_purchase.BILLING_CYCLE_PROMOTION_ACTIVE: You will automatically be billed $%pp USD every %bc days instead of $%op USD
confirm_subscription_purchase.BILLING_CYCLE_TEXT: You will automatically be billed $%pp USD every %bc days
confirm_subscription_purchase.CALLBACK_100: There was an error while trying to process your request, please contact support.
confirm_subscription_purchase.CALLBACK_102: You already have an activate subscription with this Application
confirm_subscription_purchase.CALLBACK_103: Your account is currently limited, please contact support
confirm_subscription_purchase.CALLBACK_104: You have insufficient funds in your Intellivoid Account, please add more funds.

documentation.SUB_HEADER: This page explains how COA works and how you can use it in your own software
documentation.PAGE_CONTENT: Intellivoid Accounts COA is currently in beta, documentation will be made available soon.

gba_mode.SUB_HEADER: There seems to be a government-backed attack so we disabled your account for security reasons
gba_mode.PAGE_CONTENT: We cannot disclose to you how this came to be, your account has been disabled to prevent access from you, us, others and third-party applications you've authenticated to before. Your account will be made available once we can determine that it is safe to use. This is an automated process where one or more attacks may have triggered this.

index.WELCOME_BANNER_SUB_HEADER: Need anything more to know more? Feel free to contact us at any point.
index.ACCOUNT_SECURITY_ALERT_MESSAGE: It is important that you link your Telegram Account with your Intellivoid Account, this will provide greater security to your Account and allow you to recover your account in the case you lose access to it
index.CALLBACK_100: There was a problem with the request, please make sure you are using an up to date browser
index.CALLBACK_101: The current password you've entered is incorrect
index.CALLBACK_102: The confirmation password does not match the new password
index.CALLBACK_105: There was an error with your upload, please try again
index.CALLBACK_106: The system cannot process your upload at this time, please contact our staff about this
index.CALLBACK_107: The given file type is unsupported, supported formats are JPEG and PNG
index.CALLBACK_108: The image is too small to be processed
index.CALLBACK_109: The file cannot be processed because it's invalid or corrupted
index.CALLBACK_110: Your avatar has been changed successfully
index.CALLBACK_111: There was an error while trying to submit your report

internal_authentication.PAGE_DESCRIPTION: The code below is a one-time generated login code associated with your account, this is used for internal services. Staff will never ask for this code, you should not give this code to anyone. This code will expire in 5 minutes.

landing_page.FEATURES_1_BODY: Setup multiple methods of verification of authentication, no email or phone verification
landing_page.FEATURES_2_BODY: Choose the data you want to share, there is no obligation other than your Username and Avatar
landing_page.FEATURES_3_BODY: Integrate Intellivoid Accounts into anything, even Android ROMs
landing_page.ABOUT_1_BODY: Intellivoid does not display ads or collects data about you to share with third-party companies without your consent. Your data is yours, you have the right to choose how to share it with others
landing_page.ABOUT_2_BODY: Having too many accounts for many different services can put users at risk if one service gets compromised. Instead use Intellivoid Accounts as a form of authentication for your next project
landing_page.ABOUT_3_HEADER: No more ineffective forms of verification
landing_page.ABOUT_3_BODY: Getting tired of Phone Verification / Email Verification? No more! sim swapping is a thing of the past.

login.AUTHENTICATION_HEADER: Login to an existing Intellivoid Account
login.CALLBACK_100: There was a problem with the request, please make sure you are using an up to date browser
login.CALLBACK_101: There was an error while trying to process your request, the error was reported to our staff.
login.CALLBACK_104: Your account has been suspended, if you think this was a mistake, you can contact us.
login.CALLBACK_105: You are not authorized to login to this account due to suspicious activities
login.CALLBACK_106: Your account has been created, you can login now.
login.CALLBACK_107: Your session has expired, please login again
login.CALLBACK_110: Your password has been updated successfully

login_history.CARD_DESCRIPTION: Review what devices you logged in with and when
login_history.NO_RESULTS_TEXT: There is no data to display

login_security.BANNER_SUB_HEADER: Secure your account even if somebody knows your password
login_security.CARD_MOBILE_VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: Using Google Authenticator on your phone, you can enter a time based code to verify it's you without internet access
login_security.CARD_RECOVERY_CODES_DESCRIPTION: Use one-time use recovery codes to access your account if you do not have access to your phone
login_security.CARD_TELEGRAM_VERIFICATION_DESCRIPTION: Receive authentication prompts, security updates and notifications on Telegram
login_security.DISABLE_MV_DIALOG_BODY: Please confirm that you want to disable Mobile Verification, this will not disable the other methods of verification such as Recovery Codes. Those must be disabled separately
login_security.DISABLE_RC_DIALOG_BODY: Please confirm that you want to disable recovery codes. Your old recovery codes will become invalid and you will no longer be prompted for a recovery code when trying to verify your login
login_security.DISABLE_RC_MV_DIALOG_BODY: Please confirm that you want to disable recovery codes, since you have Mobile Verification enabled as well, you may risk losing access to your account if you lose your device and have no other way to recover your account. Your old recovery codes will become invalid and you will no longer be prompted for a recovery code when trying to verify your login
login_security.DISABLE_TG_DIALOG_BODY: Please confirm that you want to unlink your Telegram Account, you will no longer receive Authentication Prompts, security notifications and application notifications.
login_security.CALLBACK_100: Mobile verification has been enabled on your account
login_security.CALLBACK_101: You cannot set up Mobile Verification because it is already enabled, you must disable it first.
login_security.CALLBACK_102: Mobile Verification cannot be disabled since it's not enabled.
login_security.CALLBACK_104: Recovery Codes cannot be disabled since it's not enabled.
login_security.CALLBACK_105: Recovery Codes verification has been disabled.
login_security.CALLBACK_106: You cannot setup Recovery Codes Verification since it's already enabled
login_security.CALLBACK_108: Your Intellivoid Account is already linked to a Telegram Account
login_security.CALLBACK_110: There was an unknown error while trying to process your request
login_security.CALLBACK_111: This Telegram is already linked to another account, to unlink your Telegram send /unlink
login_security.CALLBACK_112: You have successfully linked your Telegram to your Intellivoid Account
login_security.CALLBACK_113: There is no Telegram account linked to your Intellivoid Account
login_security.CALLBACK_114: Your Telegram account has been unlinked successfully

setup_mobile_verification.PART_1_BODY: you can use the Google Authenticator app to receive codes even if you don’t have an Internet connection.
setup_mobile_verification.PART_3_HEADER: Enter your generated code to verify
setup_mobile_verification.CALLBACK_100: The given verification code was incorrect / has expired

setup_recovery_codes.CARD_DESCRIPTION: These are one-time use recovery codes for accessing your account, this is important if you lose access to your phone or cannot verify using other methods. These codes are meant to be written down, and are case-sensitive.
setup_recovery_codes.CONFIRMATION_DIALOG_BODY: You can generate these codes again by disabling Recovery Codes and Enabling it again, but each code can only be used once! Make sure you wrote them down somewhere or saved it in a safe place.
setup_recovery_codes.CALLBACK_100: Mobile verification has been enabled on your account, it's highly recommended to setup Recovery Codes in the case that you lose your device
